sentences.english: Proudly he beat his rays upon the earth, warming the vast landthat lay below.
sentences.chinese: 他自豪地把光輝灑向地球，溫暖着腳下廣袤的土地。

sentences.english: Becky and John enjoyed camping in our big national forests on their vacations.
sentences.chinese: 貝基和約翰喜歡假期中去我們廣袤的國家森林野營。

sentences.english: Primitive humans, clad in animal skins, trekking across vast expanses of ice in a desperate search to find food.
sentences.chinese: 穿着動物皮的原始人在廣袤的冰原上辛苦地搜尋食物。

sentences.english: It is said that pauillac flower grows in the vast desert.
sentences.chinese: 據說普雅花生長在廣袤無垠的沙漠裏。

sentences.english: They farmed, irrigated , and reclaimed vast stretches of land.
sentences.chinese: 他們耕種，灌溉，並領回的廣袤的土地。

sentences.english: At the ground level an immense lawn is only interrupted by sandboxes and low vegetation arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 地面層廣袤的草坪被零星的沙盒和低矮的植被點綴。

sentences.english: The expansive Loess Plateau shows its nimble nymphalness wherever there is a stream.
sentences.chinese: 對於廣袤的黃土高原，水就是靈秀的化身。

sentences.english: He said South Sudan has a vast territory, brilliant civilizations, industrious and brave people.
sentences.chinese: 他說，南蘇丹國土廣袤，文明燦爛，人民勤勞勇敢。

sentences.english: Vast forests with pure and fresh and green.
sentences.chinese: 廣袤的森林有着清新的翠綠色。

sentences.english: Never stepped into such a cavernous space.
sentences.chinese: 從未踏進這個廣袤淵深的宇宙。

sentences.english: Water seems the incarnation of the delicately beautiful to the expansive Loess Plateau .
sentences.chinese: 對於廣袤的黃土高原，水就是靈秀的化身。

sentences.english: Though why would you rush it when journeying through far-flung Russia?
sentences.chinese: 在廣袤的俄羅斯大地上你何必匆匆趕路？

sentences.english: But the earth of that wide , have already grown dark green farm goods again.
sentences.chinese: 而那廣袤的大地，又已生長出了油綠的莊稼。

sentences.english: I see nothing outside except the endless expanse of a steel blue sky and the broad patch of tan earth far below.
sentences.chinese: 除了無邊無際的藍天和廣袤的地表，什麼也看不見。
